original: Nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa
analyzed: na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na na hetussa na sa nidassana sa paṭighassa dhammassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe… nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ pe na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na sa nidassana sa paṭighassa

original: ca nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: ca na na hetussa na sanidassana sappaṭighassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: hetum anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā na hetum anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetum anidassana appaṭighañca na hetum anidassana appaṭighañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (3) Hetuyā
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā
